overview:
Pernille has been with Nordic Venture Partners since 2007. Pernille has previously been employed with Deloitte Business Process Outsourcing as a consultant and HansenToft Management Consulting as a test instructor. In her employment for Deloitte, Pernille worked for Nordic Venture Partners as a part time consultant for more than a half year.

Pernille has a M.Sc. (Management Accounting and Control) from Copenhagen Business School and a B.Sc. (Economics and Law) from Aarhus Business School.

email: prc@nordic.com
